html:
At R.N.C., Trump Uses Tools of Presidency in Aim to Broaden AppealAt R.N.C., Trump Uses Tools of Presidency in Aim to Broaden Appeal

  • The convention swerved from the first night’s dire tone with a grab-bag of events and personal testimonials targeted especially at female and minority voters.
  • By appropriating the resources of his office, President Trump breached the traditional boundaries between campaigning and governing.
rawText:
At R.N.C., Trump Uses Tools of Presidency in Aim to Broaden Appeal
The convention swerved from the first night’s dire tone with a grab-bag of events and personal testimonials targeted especially at female and minority voters.
By appropriating the resources of his office, President Trump breached the traditional boundaries between campaigning and governing.
